itemdesc-primitivecompass-*: Easy to manufacture, allows you to find out the cardinal directions.
itemdesc-compass-*: Allows you to see your direction.
itemdesc-sextant-*: Use to see your coordinates. Takes a few seconds to home in.
itemdesc-map: Allows you to use the map.
itemdesc-compasstemporal-*: Allows you to see your direction and coordinates in real-time, no use required!
ingameerror-jps-full: JPS is already at maximum fuel capacity
fuel-time: Has fuel for {0} days and {1:0.#} hours
command-setreading: Set the coordinates of your last prospecting pick reading to add it to the map
command-setreading-success: Added last ProPick reading to map at {x}, {y}, {z}
enter-setreading: Enter coordinates with /setreading to save to map
command-setJPSchannel: Sets your JPS channel (for sharing location with other players)
show-player-error: Can't add player {0} to world map, missing entity :<
